column2: Show all basic cheat options, These cheats are regularly used small cheats mainly for your nation.
This option will convert your nation to a civilised nation.
This option will convert your nation to an uncivilised nation. This may make cause some complications when westernising.
This option will give your nation 250 prestige.
This option will give increase your nations literacy by 5% each time this decision is taken.
This option will reduce infamy by 50 each time this decision is taken.
This option will give your nation 5,000,000 research points each time this decision is taken.
This option will remove your nation from its sphere overlord if it has one.
This option will give your nation 50,000,000 each time it is used. Having a balance of over 2 Billion will break the game.
